category: Click Boards > Mixed signal > Digital potentiometer
name: mikroe.click.digipot7
short_description: DIGI POT 7 Click is a compact add-on board used as a digitally controlled potentiometer. This board features the AD5175, a single-channel 1024-position digital rheostat with less than Â±1% end-to-end resistor tolerance error and 50-time programmable wiper memory from Analog Devices. This I2C configurable IC is designed to operate as a variable resistor for analog signals, within the voltage range of single-supply operation at 2.7 V to 5.5 V.
